feed.title: Lissen Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lissen: 1.3.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Consistent Sync by @GrakovNe in https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/pull/167
  • Hungarian localization by @Kabika82
  • Fix Content caching issues on network fail during the process

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/compare/1.3.24...1.3.25

entry.title: New release for Lissen: 1.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adding release builds. by @dessalines in https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/pull/176
  • Improved Hungary language by @Kabika82

New Contributors

  • @dessalines made their first contribution in https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/pull/176

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/compare/1.3.25...1.4.0
